Name: Zoning, 78-08 Linden Boulevard Rezoning, Queens (N 240146 ZRQ).
Title: Application number N 240146 ZRQ (78-08 Linden Boulevard Rezoning) submitted by Linden Canyon LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Queens, Community District 10, Council District 32.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
